lines.text: Hey, you bald-headed prick! Don't you ever get caught on the take. Because if you wind up in any joint I'm in, you'll leave feet first.
Come on. Let's pay our respects to the grieving widow before she falls flat on her face, drunk.
Yes, unless you want to tell the Pee Wee Grogan story again.
Aww shit, anybody embarrassed about doing time is a goddamn snob. You do your time nice, don't rat anybody out, never take it in the ass, what's there to be embarrassed about huh?
